name: KRONPHOS PZ
description: Kronphos PZ is a dehydrate of zinc phosphate designed for manufacture of the anti-corrosive paints, used in demanding environment. The zinc phosphate of the PZ brand has established itself as a reliable anti-corrosion product. High zinc content allows you to add a smaller amount of pigment to obtain excellent anticorrosive properties of your products. The tone luminosity of 99% confirms the purity of our product and enables one to use the antirust pigment of the PZ brand in more complex and responsible formulations of your production.
